content: I will tell you the story of the surprise on that day. I will tell why I am doing so. I did not expect a thing and it's a wonderful thing for my way of life. He said "Do you wanna touch a star? Do you wanna shine more than ever?", I said "I wanna do so by all meanings". I thought such a chance was rare. I got excited very much. At that time I didn't hesitate to make up my mind. Now I feel the change slowly but surely. Oh can I catch the star like everyone else? I know I should 'cause I wanna get it, ready, fly high!
author: Galneryus
